bibl.title: The Role of the Strategi in Administrative Continuity in Roman Egypt.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Whitehorne, John Edwin George

bibl.note: Dans la désignation des stratèges, on n'aperçoit guère le désir de promouvoir l'efficacité administrative à ce niveau, ni le souci d'assurer la continuité administrative.
Whitehorne John Edwin George, The Role of the Strategi in Administrative Continuity in Roman Egypt.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 419-428.
